meta.title: Ali Nails | Premium Nail and Eyelash Services
meta.description: Premium nail and eyelash extension services tailored to enhance your natural beauty
meta.keywords: nail salon, eyelash extensions, beauty salon, manicure, pedicure, gel nails, acrylic nails

hero.title: Elevate Your Beauty
hero.subtitle: Premium nail and eyelash extension services tailored to enhance your natural beauty

about.title: About Alicia
about.subtitle: Passionate About Beauty
about.paragraph1: Hello everyone! My name is Alicia, and the world of beauty has always been my passion.
about.paragraph2: I started this journey over 20 years ago, and I can proudly say that I love my job. I specialize in manicures, makeup, and eyelash extensions, and I have recently started training in micropigmentation to continue offering the best to my clients. I love constantly learning and staying up to date with the latest techniques to provide high-quality service.
about.paragraph3: For me, beauty is more than just an aesthetic detail—it’s a form of self-expression and self-care. I truly enjoy seeing how even the smallest changes can make someone feel more confident and happy. I am a kind and friendly person, and I always give my best to ensure that every visit is a special experience.
about.paragraph4: For me, beauty is more than just an aesthetic detail—it’s a form of self-expression and self-care. I truly enjoy seeing how even the smallest changes can make someone feel more confident and happy. I am a kind and friendly person, and I always give my best to ensure that every visit is a special experience.

sarah.name: Sarah M.
sarah.text: Alicia is amazing! My nails have never looked better. The salon is clean, modern, and so relaxing.

jessica.name: Jessica T.
jessica.text: I've been getting my lashes done here for months. The results are always perfect and last so long!

emma.name: Emma L.
emma.text: Best nail salon in town! The attention to detail is incredible and the staff is so friendly.
